about_the_game:
Diamond Hunter

First-Person Maze Adventure

Embark on a thrilling expedition through an intricate maze with "Diamond Hunter: First-Person Maze Expedition," an enthralling adaptation of the classic Pac-Man experience. Armed with tools like a diamonds detector and bombs, your mission goes beyond survival as you navigate the labyrinth in pursuit of riches while dodging spiders.

First-Person Adventure: Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding world of Diamond Hunter, experiencing the iconic Pac-Man excitement through the eyes of a daring maze explorer equipped with specialized tools.

Diamonds Detector: Utilize an advanced diamonds detector to locate and collect precious gems strategically placed throughout the maze. Plan your route, grab the diamonds, and watch your wealth grow.

Bombs for Safety: Equip yourself with bombs strategically scattered in the maze. Use them to create safe passages, evade spiders, and turn the tide in your favor. But beware - timing is crucial!

Risk and Reward: Every diamond and bomb presents a risk-reward scenario. Balancing wealth accumulation with strategic decisions will determine your success in the maze.

Embark on a quest for riches, strategic exploration, and nostalgic charm in Diamond Hunter: First-Person Maze Expedition. Can you navigate the maze, collect the diamonds, and emerge as the ultimate Hunter of diamonds? The journey awaits, fortune seeker!

name: Diamond Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630 / AMD Vega 8
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7 / Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a classic first-person Pac-Man journey through the maze. Utilize a diamonds detector for wealth and bombs to outwit spiders. Balance risk and reward, emerge as the champion in this strategic maze adventure!
